'''Changhu''' {{Lang|zh=昌虎|zh_rm=Chānghǔ}} is an [[NPC]] in [[Liyue Harbor]]. He can be found at [[Heyu Tea House]] during the day (until 19:00), conversing with his master [[Gentry Maocai]].

==Location==
<gallery hideaddbutton="true" captionalign="center">
NPC Location Changhu & Gentry Maocai.png|Changhu's location ''(Daytime)''
NPC Location Tea Master Liu Su Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Profile==
Changhu serves [[Gentry Maocai]] and, under orders of his boss, attempts to extort [[Chang the Ninth]]'s [[Cor Lapis]] supply during [[Xingqiu]]'s [[Story Quest]], "[[Bookworm Swordsman]]."

===Personality===
Changhu is an arrogant and foul mouthed man, resorting to violence when opportunity seeks it. He does his best to appease Gentry Maocai, complimenting him and his anecdotes.

===Appearance===
Changhu is a muscular man clad in loose brown pants, a beige tee, and a light brown vest on top. He wears bandage appendages on both his wrists and ankles, with light brown cuffs and dark brown shoes. His hair is black and short, with a V-shaped hairline and hazel eyes.
